channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: A beginner’s guide to Mastodon, the open source Twitter alternative
item.description: Unless if you’re really in the know about nascent platforms, you probably didn’t know what Mastodon was until Elon Musk bought Twitter and renamed it X. In the initial aftermath of the acquisition, as users fretted over what direction Twitter would take, millions of users hopped over to Mastodon, a fellow microblogging site. As time […]

item.title: How to watch Wild London on BBC iPlayer (it's FREE)
item.description: David Attenborough reveals the wild heart of London — here’s how to watch Wild London online and for free from any country as the urban wildlife doc wows TV viewers.

item.title: European banks plan to cut 200,000 jobs as AI takes hold
item.description: The bloodletting will hit hardest in back-office operations, risk management, and compliance.

item.title: Public Domain Day 2026 list: Betty Boop, Disney cartoons, classic books, and more
item.description: Early versions of Betty Boop, Pluto, and Mickey and Minnie Mouse are on the list.

item.title: There Is So Much New Lego You Can Buy in January
item.description: The new year is always a wild time for Lego releases, and 2026 is certainly no exception.
